column4: Guys, how can I make ubuntu forget the applications that it has remembered? ( I checked and now unchecked the Remember running applications when logging out, but even now the applications open up)
thats a bug, I know the command to clobber/fix, one sec
click on set system time and then unlock using your password, you should be able to do it
I think you can just: rm -R ~/.config/gnome-session
